title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When accessing the Enter Parameters dialog after clicking the Show Report Parameters button, all parameter values are empty.
EB: When accessing the Enter Parameters dialog after clicking the Show Report Parameters button, the default values should be displayed in the value box for each parameter. This will allow me to easily modify the parameter values that I want to change.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create several report parameters.
2. Set default values for the report parameters.
3. Drag the report parameters to the layout.
4. Preview the report.
5. Click the Show Report Parameters button in the preview.
6. Verify that the default values are not displayed in the Enter Parameters dialog.
